scripts.build: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib build && pnpm --filter formular.components build
scripts.build:dev: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib build && pnpm --filter formular.components build:dev
scripts.build:integration: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib build && pnpm --filter formular.components build:integration
scripts.build:production: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib build && pnpm --filter formular.components build:production
scripts.test: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib test && pnpm --filter formular.components test
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter formular.dev.lib test:coverage && pnpm --filter formular.components test:coverage
scripts.dev: pnpm run watch:lib & pnpm run start:dev
